title: Unban Tokens
body:
Hi, im not banned or anything but i had an idea.
I was thinking about bans back when i had a ban for a week, i was thinking it would be great if i could just pay a small fee and get back to playing. I was thinking about the price of 1 dollar a day:

1 day ban = $1.00

2 day ban = $2.00

And so on. But what about Perma-Bans, would this cost 30-40 dollars or what? Please respond

replies.body: I'd pay mad cash my my very first account back. The one Riot said they'd unban then told me to %%%% off.
Let's let people be toxic as long as they have money! It sounds just like our government!
But would they still be toxic if they had to pay to get back on?

> [{quoted}](name=The Type Writer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lpB9KuqY,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-04T22:24:30.221+0000)
>
> But would they still be toxic if they had to pay to get back on?

There are a lot of players who have levelled a new account and are still toxic. So yes.
people get banned for a reason....  they need tosort their ♥♥♥♥ out instead of trying to buy their way out
